reviewText: Outstanding book on why we should all be juicing fresh (preferably organic) fruits and vegetables for optimal health. Plus, what to juice for what illness, etc. This book is highly recommended by Jay Kordich, "The Father of Juicing" (and he also highly endorses  "Live Food Juicing" by Dr. H. E. Kirschner, also available via amazon). Jay fully credits juicing in his overcoming of bladder cancer when he was a young man
